mapper.insert: INSERT INTO space (user_id, total_size, used_size, status, total_downloads, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{totalSize}, #{usedSize}, #{status}, #{totalDownloads}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE space SET user_id = #{userId}, total_size = #{totalSize}, used_size = #{usedSize}, status = #{status}, total_downloads = #{totalDownloads}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE space SET used_size = #{usedSize}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE space SET total_downloads = total_downloads + 1, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
